scripts.start_backend: cd Mongo_Operations/ && npm install && cd ../To_Do_Curd_API  && npm install && npm run withoutdebug
scripts.start_frontend: cd angular6-frontend/ && npm install  && ng serve --port=4200 -o
scripts.After_Some_Change_debug: cd Mongo_Operations/ && npm install && cd ../MVC_Pattern_API/To_Do_List/ && npm install && npm  start
scripts.After_Some_Change: cd Mongo_Operations/ && npm install && cd ../MVC_Pattern_API/To_Do_List/ && npm install && npm run withoutdebug
scripts.mongo_test: cd Mongo_Operations/ && npm install && npm test
scripts.todolistapi_test: cd To_Do_Curd_API/ && npm intsall && npm test
